pages.title: Smalltooth Sawfish
pages.text: The smalltooth sawfish ($(o)Pristis pectinata$()) is a species of sawfish in the family Pristidae.$(br2)It is found in shallow tropical and subtropical waters in coastal and estuarine parts of the Atlantic.$(br2)Reports from elsewhere are now believed to be misidentifications of other species of sawfish.

pages.title: Smalltooth Sawfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: None Days
